bean.read: select id, title, alert, workflow, channel_id as "channelId", creation_time as "creationTime", last_modified as "lastModified" from pns_message where id = ${this.id}
select id from pns_message where workflow != 2 order by creation_time desc limit 1
bean.read-list: select id from pns_queue where platform = 2 and message_id = ${this.id}
bean.create: insert into pns_message ( channel_id, title, alert, workflow, creation_time, last_modified ) values ( ${this.channelId}, ${this.title}, ${this.alert}, ${this.workflow}, ${this.creationTime}, ${this.lastModified} )
